fullDescription.intro: Given the outfiles from the DepthOfCoverage node, this node creates a summary plot for the overall read coverage. The plot shows the coverage for each sample of the input.

option.name: Path to folder with plot data

fullDescription.option: All files with the given suffix will be considered as per locus coverage files generated by GATK DepthOfCoverage. This options are ignored, if the node's inport is connected to another node.

ports.inPort: Table of per locus coverage files. Files specified in the lines of the first column of the input table are considered as per locus coverage files.
